name: Gas Buffer
description:
Blast gas atoms with your laser (preferably matching your shot colors to the atom colors) to keep the atoms from overflowing the buffer as long as possible.

Left mouse button shoots light lasers, right mouse button shoots dark lasers. Mismatched color shots do less damage and may cause you to run out of ammo. Destroying chains of like-colored atoms increases the damage of your shots.

Made in about four hours...
